introduction.section1: Southeast Asian country, surrounded by Thailand, Laos, and Vietnam.
introduction.section2: Famous for Siem Reap and the ruins of Angkor Wat, you can also sail on Tonle Sap Lake and observe the life of floating villages. In Phnom Penh, visit the royal palace and the former prison from the Khmer Rouge regime, a moving story that will make you discover Cambodia differently.
introduction.section3: Discover Cambodia through our articles and our photos.

google-description: Discover through our articles and our photos Cambodia, the ruined temples of Angkor, the floating villages, and many other must-see places. Follow us to discover our selection of must-see places. For each place visited we try to transcribe our visit as best as possible by telling you: Where to go? How to get there? Why? When? How long and at what period?
social-network-description: Famous for Siem Reap and the ruins of Angkor Wat, you can also sail on Tonle Sap Lake and observe the life of floating villages. In Phnom Penh, visit the royal palace and the former prison from the Khmer Rouge regime, a moving story that will make you discover Cambodia differently. Follow our city-to-city guide to discover our selection of must-see places.

tour.title: Travel around
tour.subtitle: The country from city to city
